Statute.Title: Canada-Yukon Oil and Gas Accord Implementation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Accord Canada — Yukon sur le pétrole et le gaz, Loi de mise en oeuvre de l’)

Minister.Text: Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development

CIF.Text: CIF, 1998, c. 5, ss. 1 to 10, 14, 15, 17 and 19 to 27 in force on assent 12.05.98; ss. 11, 12, 13, 16 and 18 come into force on the transfer date see s. 28 (transfer date 19.11.98 see P.C. 1998-2022)
CIF, 1998, c. 15, s. 49 to come into force conditionally in accordance with the terms of that provision

Item.Text: — s. 117(2) comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 285(3) — Not in force
